title: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: The All types dialog in JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes (e.g. a, a1, b, c, d) etc.
OB: When opening the All types dialog in JDK 1.4, obfuscated classes are displayed along with regular classes.
EB: Obfuscated classes should not be displayed in the All types dialog.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the IDE and navigate to the All types dialog.
2. Observe the presence of obfuscated classes in the list.
3. Compare the list with the list of valid classes in JDK 1.4.
